AI Description: aria2 is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, BitTorrent and Metalink. aria2 can be manipulated via built-in JSON-RPC and XML-RPC interfaces.
Core Features: Multi-Protocol & Multi-Source Download Utility, Supports Http/Https, Ftp, Bittorrent, & Metalink Protocols, Highly Customizable With Many Settings & Configurations, Supports Segmented Downloading For Faster Speeds, Command-Line Interface For Ease Of Use, Can Be Controlled Through Json-Rpc & Xml-Rpc Interfaces
General Tags: Download Manager, Command-Line Utility, Cross-Platform, Open Source
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Other Computer & Information Sciences
